Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide-Peptoid Hybrids with and without Membrane Disruption.
Literature.Author: Bonvin E, Personne H, Paschoud T, Reusser J, Gan BH, Luscher A, Köhler T, van Delden C, Reymond JL
